description: Skuld is the younger sister of Belldandy and is the third Goddess to appear to Keiichi Morisato. Skuld is an engineering genius, capable of building just about anything out of the most mundane parts under most limited resources. Skuld regularly clashes with her sister Urd, particularly when it comes to Belldandy`s relationship with Keiichi. However, the two sisters do love each other and will work together to solve a problem or stave off a mutual threat.
name: Skuld
